title: Potato
description: Watch and learn how to cut potato using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Potato
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut potato using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[Potato]

Let me use a seven inch santoku knife to cut some red potatoes. So anytime when cutting potatoes, it's important to square them of. So using your fingers as a guard and a sharp santoku,  your're gonna slice down just straight through and then just cut in an even cube. Next we use a similar technique to cut a red potato into match sticks or something you would use for french fries. Cutting it into squared off pieces in order to dice it through will keep you safe. Cut about a medium dice or about a quarter to a half of an inch and then just cut it into very fine strips. We have a potato cut into two ways. Medium dice and match sticks
